articles.description: Toby Roberts wins Great Britain's 14th gold in Paris and their first medal in sport climbing at an Olympics in the boulder and lead event.
articles.title: Olympic climbing: Toby Roberts wins climbing gold for Team GB

articles.description: Katarina Johnson-Thompson will race for Olympic heptathlon gold in the 800m after finishing the morning session in second place, 121 points behind. Nafissatou Thiam.
articles.title: Olympic athletics: Katarina Johnson-Thompson second behind Nafissatou Thiam with just 800m left

articles.description: Men's 200m gold medallist Letsile Tebogo says he doesn't believe he can be the face of athletics because he is not a "arrogant or loud" person - adding that the USA's Noah Lyles is.
articles.title: Paris 2024: Men’s 200m champion Letsile Tebogo on Noah Lyles

articles.description: Your day-by-day guide to what is happening when - and who to watch out for - at the Paris 2024 Olympics.
articles.title: Olympics schedule & day-by-day guide to key events & British medal hopes at Paris 2024

articles.description: Find out the medal table from the Paris Olympics 2024, including overall medals, gold medals, silver medals and bronze medals for Team GB and other countries.
articles.title: Olympic Medal Table - Paris 2024 gold, silver & bronze tally

articles.description: Under-21s boss Lee Carsley has been appointed interim England manager for the upcoming Nations League games as the search for Gareth Southgate's successor continues.
articles.title: Lee Carsley named England's interim manager

articles.description: Toby Roberts wins a spectacular gold for Team GB as Katarina Johnson-Thompson trails Nafissatou Thiam going into the final event of the heptathlon.
articles.title: Paris Olympics: Top five stories from day 14 of 2024 Games

articles.description: All the latest football transfers news, Manchester City's news conference before the Community Shield and build-up to the EFL's opening season matches.
articles.title: Transfer news live, Man City news conference & EFL build-up

articles.description: Tottenham Hotspur are in advanced talks with Bournemouth about a £60m move for Dominic Solanke.
articles.title: Dominic Solanke: Tottenham close on deal for Bournemouth striker

articles.description: Celtic captain Callum McGregor announces his retirement from international football with Scotland.
articles.title: Celtic's Callum McGregor retires from Scotland duty
